name: Nautilus
title: the Titan of the Depths
shortBio: A lonely legend as old as the first piers sunk in Bilgewater, the armored goliath known as Nautilus roams the dark waters off the coast of the Blue Flame Isles. Driven by a forgotten betrayal, he strikes without warning, swinging his enormous anchor to save the wretched, and drag the greedy to their doom. It is said he comes for those who forget to pay the “Bilgewater tithe”, pulling them down beneath the waves with him—an iron-clad reminder that none can escape the depths.

skins.name: Abyssal Nautilus
skins.description: “Never once have I sailed these waves looking for missing divers. Something unnatural lives in the depths, and I fear what it does to these lost souls.”

skins.name: AstroNautilus

chromas.name: AstroNautilus

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Pulsefire event.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2020 Pulsefire event.

skins.description: In space, the anchor weighs practically nothing.

skins.name: Warden Nautilus
skins.description: Shock troopers such as Nautilus bound their souls to suits of ancient Warden armor, becoming one with the powerful enchantments worked into the metal. Few of these suits now remain, though their method of creation seems to have been closely tied to a cataclysmic event known only as the Rune War.

skins.name: Worldbreaker Nautilus
skins.description: The first of four titans prophesied to shatter the world, Nautilus is set to rise when the moon smothers the sun. It is said he will emerge from the sea, heralding a great cleansing tide that will wash away all of mankind.

skins.name: Shan Hai Scrolls Nautilus

chromas.name: Shan Hai Scrolls Nautilus

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

skins.description: A guardian who helped seal the mad god Jhin within a holy waterfall, as depicted within the mysterious painting known as the Shan Hai Scrolls. Over the millenia, Jhin has whispered of power, freedom, and true godhood to Nautilus, until he finally released him. Now twisted with anger, Nautilus's rivers run not with water, but molten magma.

skins.name: Fright Night Nautilus

chromas.name: Fright Night Nautilus

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

skins.description:
Strange and ghoulish screaming woke Nautilus into being
He made his way outside to find them most displeasing
These lousy, no good neighbors, always there sightseeing!
“What kind of butler would I be if I don't send them fleeing?”

skins.name: Cosmic Paladin Nautilus

chromas.name: Cosmic Paladin Nautilus

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

chromas.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.

skins.description: A creature found aimlessly wandering between galaxies, no one knows where Nautilus came from, or how he has stayed alive in the space between stars. But his natural resistance to the entropic forces of the Dark Star attracted the attention of Bel'Veth. He has found meaning and purpose as a Paladin, where before he simply drifted amongst the cosmos.

skins.name: Crystalis Indomitus Nautilus
skins.description: Long ago, Nautilus had been a fisherman by his friend Xerath's side. Together the two discovered a mass of powerful crystals, and greed drove his comrade to cast Nautilus into the water to drown. A single crystal sustained him and, as he slumbered, corrupted and empowered his body and mind. But even this could not destroy his strongest desire—revenge.

passive.name: Staggering Blow
passive.description: Nautilus' first Attack against a target deals increased physical damage and roots them briefly.

spells.name: Dredge Line
spells.description: Nautilus hurls his anchor forward.  Colliding with an enemy pulls them and Nautilus together, dealing magic damage.  Colliding with terrain pulls Nautilus towards it.
spells.dynamicDescription: Nautilus hurls his anchor forward. If it hits an enemy, Nautilus drags himself and the target together, dealing <magicDamage>@QDamageCalc@ magic damage</magicDamage> and <status>Stunning</status> them briefly. If the anchor hits terrain, Nautilus will drag himself towards it.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Titan's Wrath
spells.description: Nautilus gains a temporary Shield.  While it persists, his Attacks deal damage over time to his target and surrounding enemies.
spells.dynamicDescription: Nautilus gains a <shield>@ShieldCalc@ Shield</shield> for @ShieldDuration@ seconds. While the <shield>Shield</shield> persists, Nautilus' Attacks deal an additional <magicDamage>@DotDamageCalc@ magic damage</magicDamage> over 2 seconds to his target and all surrounding enemies.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Riptide
spells.description: Nautilus creates three exploding waves around himself. Each explosion damages and slows enemies.
spells.dynamicDescription: Nautilus creates three exploding waves around himself, each dealing <magicDamage>@DamageCalc@ magic damage</magicDamage> to enemies in the area and <status>Slows</status> them by @SlowPercent*100@% decaying over @SlowDuration@ seconds.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Depth Charge
spells.description: Nautilus fires a shockwave into the earth that chases an opponent. This shockwave rips up the earth above it, knocking enemies into the air. When it reaches the opponent, the shockwave erupts, knocking his target into the air and stunning them.
spells.dynamicDescription: Nautilus fires a shockwave that chases an enemy champion, dealing <magicDamage>@PrimaryTargetDamage@ magic damage</magicDamage>, <status>Knocking</status> them <status>Up</status> and <status>Stunning</status> them for @StunDuration@ seconds. Other enemies hit by the shockwave are also <status>Knocked Up</status> and <status>Stunned</status> and take <magicDamage>@SecondaryTargetDamage@ magic damage</magicDamage>.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
